actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend section 204 (a) of the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 in order to change the loan program under such section to a grant program.

summary.text: Amends the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 to change the redevelopment area loan program to a grant program for economic development.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 204 (a) of the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 in order to change the loan program under such section to a grant program.
